lead_paragraph: They pressed ahead with a Beijing trip, and Korea’s president criticized them for “sympathizing” with the Chinese over the American military’s Terminal High-Altitude Area Defense system.

headline.print_headline: South Koreans’ Visit to China Deepens a Rift
headline.main: 6 South Korean Lawmakers Accused of Taking China’s Side Against Antimissile System

snippet: They pressed ahead with a Beijing trip, and Korea’s president criticized them for “sympathizing” with the Chinese over the American military’s Terminal High-Altitude Area Defense system....
abstract: South Korean lawmakers travel to Beijing to discuss deployment of American military missile defense system on peninsula, move that has opened damaging rift between South Korea and China.

keywords.name: subject
keywords.value: United States Defense and Military Forces
